title: Adamant heraldic armour

properties.name: description
properties.value: Adamant heraldic armour are pieces of the adamant armour set that have a heraldic design on them. The heraldic armour set consists of a helm, platebody and shield, which can be only obtained as a reward from medium Treasure Trails. The helms, platebodies and shields are equivalent, in stats, to the adamant full helm, the adamant platebody and adamant kiteshield respectively and requires a Defence level of 30 to equip.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Adamant heraldic armour

Adamant heraldic armour are pieces of the adamant armour set that have a heraldic design on them. The heraldic armour set consists of a helm, platebody and shield, which can be only obtained as a reward from medium Treasure Trails. The helms, platebodies and shields are equivalent, in stats, to the adamant full helm, the adamant platebody and adamant kiteshield respectively and requires a Defence level of 30 to equip.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • An update on 4 August 2010 added heraldic platebodies and platelegs to the game. These pieces are not present in Old School RuneScape.
